description: A library for Amazon dashbutton hijinks.
name: Dashlib

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: I keep thinking markdown header is "=" and not "#" fixed that.
posts.title: typo

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Narcolapser/dashlib into headless
posts.title: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Narcolapser/dashlib into headless

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message:
It's time for bed. But I got this basically to where I wanted it. It is generalized so you can now setup a system relatively easily. There is a bit of effort getting the interface setup properly, but assuming you can do that, the rest is easy.

I expanded and updated the README.md preparing for a github release in the near future.
posts.title: Just needs a touch of polish.

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: I've started to break things up in a sensible way to make this a library that can be reused more and hopefully distributed to the world at large. It's got some ways to go yet, but right now I need to do some sys admin stuff with my repos so I need this code commited so I can move it.
posts.title: Progress towards a more sensible library.

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: I'm saving what I've got here now, but I think I'm going to take this project in a bit of a different direction. I'm not going to bother with turning this into a service, but rather I will try to make it easy to use so that if a service is what you want, you can make it your self. I'll just make this a library that is easy to work with. And maybe a docker container.
posts.title: Maybe a change in direction is needed.

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message:
I've not yet achieved making this a functional service. It's a step that continues to alude me. I think I'm going to have to devote a decent amount of time to the study of how linux services are made and then I might be able to get this working the way I want it to.

The good thing is that the functional side of it works just fine.
posts.title: Services are confusing.

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: I've made a lot of progress. I'll still have to implement a status message of some sort, but a great deal of progress has been made! woohoo!
posts.title: Nearly done!

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: I've not moved the files to more sensilbe names. Also I have added all of the cases for the python script to deal with the service requests. I'll just need to implement them now.
posts.title: Moved files to new names. Added cases.

posts.author: Toben Archer
posts.message: I removed the options so that you wouldn't have to specifiy anything at the command line. I'll add a config file later, but for now this will help with the creation of a simple service.
posts.title: Simplified the server a bit.
